title: Gravel Gear HV Men's Type E High Visibility 300 Denier Ripstop Rain Pants - Lime, XL
features: Critical seams are taped for waterproof protection

description: These Gravel Gear HV Men's Type E High Visibility 300 Denier Ripstop Rain Pants keep you dry in the rain. Made with a rugged 300 denier polyester outer shell, with critical seams taped for waterproof protection. These pants are bright fluorescent green with with long-wearing 2in. reflective material, so you'll always been seen, no matter the conditions.
